CustomField.formula: AND( ISBLANK(Account.Current_Contract_End_Date_New__c), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Lost"), ISPICKVAL( Type, "Existing Business-Renewal"), Startdate_contract__c <= Today(), End_date_contract__c > TODAY(), OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account.Type, "Ex-customer")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account.Customer_Stage__c , "Churned"))))
CustomField.label: Flow: Ex-customer
